Enchanter documentation
------------------------
Enchanter is a library for machine learning tasks for comet.ml users.

.. image:: https://api.codacy.com/project/badge/Grade/84197fb283924f02a1667cea49dd031a
   :target: https://app.codacy.com/manual/KawashimaHirotaka/enchanter?utm_source=github.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_content=khirotaka/enchanter&utm_campaign=Badge_Grade_Dashboard
   :alt: codacy

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/enchanter?color=brightgreen
   :target: https://pypi.org/project/enchanter/
   :alt: PyPI

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/enchanter/badge/?version=latest
   :target: https://enchanter.readthedocs.io/ja/latest/?badge=latest
   :alt: Documentation Status

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/github/license/khirotaka/enchanter?color=light
   :alt: licence


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/PyTorch-red.svg?labelColor=f3f4f7&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,



Installation
============

Install the latest version of Enchanter with ``pip``.

.. code-block:: sh

   pip install enchanter
